name: Projectile Mania (Web Audio is Broken, Please Download)
name_original: Projectile Mania (Web Audio is Broken, Please Download)
description:
[Web audio is broken. Please download the game for audio.]
Control a turret and shoot the target as many times as you can before your health runs out! Aim and bounce the bullets to hit the target in tough positions. Save up bullets to shoot more at the same time and gain more points!

The download version is recommended since it has less lag.
